overview: Dirty Money takes you on a sexual roller coaster as you explore a day in the life of a hundred dollar bill. From being paid to a therapist, bribed to a cop, stolen by a teen, and given to a hooker, Benjamin gets passed around like a dirty little whore, seeing all the hot sex along the way. While money might not be able to buy happiness - it can definitely lead to some down and dirty sex!
title: Dirty Money
